Text:
Hello jeff,

Strange thing. I got this uploaded on several private trackers and none complained about it. Probably is something from you. Let me see if I find out  if there is something I can do for you.

You're right, VLC plays it with delay!

There is something you can do. Just install and use Splash Pro Ex. It plays the video correctly. And by the way, after 1 weak of use you won't come back to VLC. I've been a VLC user for 2y til I found this app. 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6801877/Splash_Pro_EX_v1.12_Incl_Serials_[ThumperDC]

Take your time avec this nice doc and please feedback.
Same problem here. Even with Splash Pro it is still out os sync.
